summary: An ordinance relating to certain positions in the Department of the City Comptroller, heretofore connected with the enforcement of Ordinance No. 67614 (Solid Fuel); prescribing additional duties connected with the enforcement of Ordinance No. 41014 (Weights and Measures), as amended by Ordinance No. 67613; and transferring and appropriating funds from the Solid Fuel Inspection and Enforcement Fund in connection therewith.
